rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Lobby
rooms.description: Spacious entry with eco-friendly natural lighting and ventilation. Materials include reclaimed wood and stone finishes.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living space integrating indoor-outdoor connectivity with large windows and sliding doors leading to the courtyard. Eco-friendly LED fixtures, energy-efficient glazing, and sustainable materials are used.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom with ensuite bathroom
rooms.description: Luxurious guest suite featuring natural ventilation and Vastu-compliant layout ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Suite
rooms.description: Private master bedroom with attached eco-friendly en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet and private balcony, designed for relaxation and well-being. Materials include bamboo flooring and non-toxic paints to adhere to green building standards.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, natural ventilation, and ample storage space integrated into the design with sustainable materials such as recycled glass countertops.

rooms.name: Utility Room/Service Area
rooms.description: Dedicated area for eco-friendly water recycling systems, waste management and energy-efficient equipment. Vastu principles ensure its placement to maximize positive flow.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Comfortable living space for domestic help with integrated kitchenette, private bathroom, and storage areas. Designed following eco-friendly practices and ensuring privacy.

openings.material: Recycled aluminum frame with double-glazed units
